task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Using expression-only data from the processed MERFISH mouse brain AnnData, perform one-vs-all t-test differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), convert to uppercase gene symbols (deduplicate, remove Ensembl IDs), identify clusters expressing microglia markers, and return the combined microglia marker genes in top genes from those microglia clusters as cell_types_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (≥80% overlap with 11 GT markers using top-16).
